dct_title_s: Map of the Colony and Protectorate of Nigeria, 1939
dct_description_sm: Map shows international, provincial, Cameroons under British Mandated territory boundaries, provincial and divisional headquarters, towns and villages, railways, and two classes of roads. Original map is filed in the Map and Geospatial Information Center. A map reproduction is attached to companion volume. Crown copyright reserved. Map shows international, provincial, and mandated territory boundaries, provincial and divisional headquarters, towns and villages, railways, and all-season and dry-season roads.
